name: azurecurve Taxonomy Archive
author: azurecurve

sections.description:
Displays Index of Categories/Tags or other taxonomy types using taxonomy-index Shortcode. This plugin is multi-site compatible.

Example use: [taxonomy-index taxonomy=’category’ slug=’ice-cream’]

Alternative ti shortcode can also be used

Taxonomy can be set to category or tag or other taxonomy post type.
sections.installation: To install the plugin copy the azurcurve-taxonomy-index folder into your plug-in directory and activate it.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatible with both WordPress and ClassicPress?

  • Yes, this plugin will work with both.
sections.changelog:
Changes and feature additions for the Taxonomy Archive plugin:

2.0.2

  • Move menu to includes folder for easier maintenance

2.0.1

  • Correct issue with if exists azurecurve menu

2.0.0

  • Add azurecurve menu

1.0.0

  • First version
